snippet: A longtime department employee was charged with accepting money to ignore safety violations at day care centers in New York.
abstract: Longtime New York City Fire Department employee Carlos Montoya is accused of accepting bribes to ignore fire safety violations at day care centers in New York as well as taking money to help day care operators obtain fake paperwork certifying them as eligible to provide services for infants.
lead_paragraph: A longtime department employee was charged with accepting money to ignore safety violations at day care centers in New York.

headline.seo: Fire Inspector Charged in Day Care Scheme
headline.main: Inspector at Fire Dept. Took Bribes, Officials Say
